message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12000. It's a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate it, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $10000 for the product. Let me know if this is possible.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  While I understand you're looking for a good deal, $10000 simply isn't enough for me. How about we split the difference? I'm willing to accept $11000 for the product. Let's make this happen!
